website_summaries.verdict: This popular shredded memory foam pillow costs less than other comparable pillows and performs well.
pros: Quality high-density shredded memory foam filling can be adjusted to user preference
Molds to the shape of your head and neck for superb support and comfort
Nontoxic, hypoallergenic, and dust mite resistant
Breathable Kool-Flow Bamboo case allows air to circulate, reducing nighttime sweating
Both the pillow and case are machine washable for cleaning convenience
cons: Some owners complained of a lingering chemical odor

customer_reviews.title: Great head support
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this pillow for about a month now. Great head support. I do sleep better with it. I'm not the only one who likes my pillow. Honey likes it when I work nights
customer_reviews.author: Paul T. Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Best Pillow Available!
customer_reviews.text: Loving my new pillow! It took a few nights and some adjusting but finally found the perfect fill. My wife may be getting one soon. FYI my Chiropractor swears by this pillow and was the one that recommended it as the best on the market, especially for pain from sleeping in poor positions. This will be your pillow for life!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: 1 Star is too generous
customer_reviews.text: After reading the amazing reviews on this pillow I was so excited to try it out. I did everything as instructed and couldn’t believe how uncomfortable i was. I’ve given it a few months hoping to “break it in” and it has progressively gotten worse. Thinking I was going crazy, I let my husband try it out and he said it was one of the worst nights of sleep he’s ever gotten. My back is out of wack and I’m tired all the time. I want a refund. Just horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Ezell

customer_reviews.title: Too firm or too lumpy, but great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the package this pillow is way too tall and too stiff (as they note). I tired adjusting the pillow about 7 times, removing the filling, adding filling, trying to get it right. I couldn't. It was either too full and too hard, or incredibly lumpy with the materials moving to opposite ends if the pillow leaving my head in the lumpy middle. I called their customer service and they IMMEDIATELY sent me a return label with no questions asked. I didn't love the pillow but it is well run business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: $65 I paid for this pillow, sometimes you don’t always get what you pay for. First thing first is the pillow came to me with condensation all over the bag, opened it up and it gave off a smell of dirty laundry. Second problem; pillow never “inflated” it stayed flat and wet, so it came with instructions to put it into dryer on high heat so now I have a hot pillow that smells like dirty laundry and stays completely flat. Incredibly disappointing experience, these are some serious quality control issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ragnar Lodbrok

customer_reviews.title: Soooo disappointed,
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had not spent this amount of money for such a bad pillow! At least half of the foam is in large chunks that feel very lumpy. I think the thick bamboo cover is there to reduce feeling all the chunks. It is also a very hard and high pillow as received. I have taken foam out (what a mess!!) and put some back in, but no success in reaching a comfortable level of height and hardness/softness. I rarely leave reviews of any kind, but felt I had to with this pillow. I don't know where all these positive reviews are coming from, but that has not been my experience. Keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: This thing reeks.
customer_reviews.text: Due to the smell, I let this pillow air out for two nights before I even tried to sleep on it. I've aired it out during the day for two more days and tried to sleep on it at night. Although it has potential to be comfortable with some adjustment (I took some filling out because I'm petite and need a lower-loft pillow), I don't think I can trust all the chemicals coming off of it, especially considering we spend 1/3 of our lives in bed. My sense of smell is very keen and the smell is walking me up multiple times during the night. I'll try the dryer, as suggested, but if that doesn't work, it's going back.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: ... pillow for my husband in July and it is awesome! So for Christmas I said I wanted one ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pillow for my husband in July and it is awesome! So for Christmas I said I wanted one of these pillows. Well When I received my pillow it felt different. Hubby said maybe it needs to break down. So I have used it for a few months and it still was not right. It was to hard. I removed stuffing and noticed that it was different than the stuffing used in his. This stiffing was ground in bigger chunks and of poor quality memory foam. I'm very disappointed in the quality of the cheap foam used in a pillow we paid quite a bit of money for considering it is a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: sandra r vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Never right
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back a dozen times for various filling issues. Used it for over a year on and off, it's just never been comfortable. Actually I believe it has messed up my neck and causing me migraines. Pillow is very firm and goes flat easily. Also a lot of open space in the pillow with no form which all the foam will migrate to over night as your head moves around causing a flat spot.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler C

customer_reviews.title: Overpowering chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: The pillow arrived five days ago. I unrolled it, placed it in a pillowcase and tried it out. The chemical stench that emanated from that pillow was overpowering! It made me feel sick. I put the pillow in another room and went back to sleeping on my old pillow, hoping that the smell would have dissipated by the next day. It hasn't. I am concerned about the chemicals inside this pillow that are causing it to smell so bad. And now -- five days after I took it out of its packaging, it still stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy

customer_reviews.title: Hard as rock!
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the pillow at all, it was the worst sleep on it! It's like you are sleeping on a hard thick rock. I know you can customize it but I would customize something that is good at the beginning just not the right fit, but it was soooo uncomfortable I just don't know why I should spend my time and effort on making something that pricey work. Also a lot of reviews stating it was hard said that customization did not work for them. And on top of everything the smell! I woke up with this smell although I'm not sensitive to scents it bothered me.
customer_reviews.author: Konstantin Frolov

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before purchase, and wanted to love this pillow. On the positive side: this is a quality made pillow, and the case is second to none. This said, the reality for me is this pillow is not comfortable. Tried it for 12 months and quite frankly can’t get a good night’s sleep. It flattens out way to much and am constantly “fluffing it” for it to be supportive enough - this however is just a temporary fix until it flattens out again. Not positive but the filler doesn’t seem to be consistent throughout (firm spots and soft spots that just don’t work together well). Donated it to our guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: After two years, not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow 2 years ago and can’t say it was worth the price. The shredded foam filling redistributes itself constantly so that you either have flip and rotate the pillow, throw it in the dryer, or unzip it and try to move the foam on a weekly basis. That last one is very messy, with tiny foam bits always escaping no matter how careful you are. This pillow needs more care than some of my houseplants. Based on the fact I can get an equivalent (or better) night’s sleep with many standard hotel pillows, I’d recommend focusing your memory foam efforts on the mattress, and just get a decent regular pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Janears

customer_reviews.title: If you like sleeping on a rock, this pillow is for you.
customer_reviews.text: I emailed the company and was sent a softer blend of foam, since the pillow felt like I was sleeping on a rock. Even after switching out some of the old foam with the small amount of new foam I was sent, I am still not a fan of this pillow. Being a side sleeper, I feel like it puts way to much pressure on my neck and shoulder, and doesn't provide much support. I personally prefer the soft feel of a feather pillow than the hard and lumpy feel of this pillow. I'm not particularly sure how this pillow has such great reviews, but can assure you that it does not stand up to the hype.
customer_reviews.author: cntrygrl023

customer_reviews.title: I felt the pillows were perfect just as they were
customer_reviews.text: Received my 2 queen pillows and I absolutely LUV them. I read the instructions and allowed them to inflate after unwrapping. This did not take long at all. I also did not notice any 'smell'. These pillows are amazingly supportive. I did not have to take any fill out. I felt the pillows were perfect just as they were; but it is SO nice to be able to customize the fluff. Seriously, how amazing is it to be able to adjust the fill of your pillows. I woke up the next morning realizing I slept the whole night soundly..not needing to adjust pillows. Well worth the price. When finances allow, I am planning on replacing all my pillows with these.
customer_reviews.author: nan

customer_reviews.title: Flat and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I would have returned this but life got in the way and I missed the return window. I kept on trying to give it a chance but continually woke up uncomfortably with this pillow. It seems that maybe I got a defective one. I ordered the king size pillow and it seems there is only half the amount of filling there should be. The pillow gets flat/mountain spots very quickly and result in a stiff neck (see photos). If I put it in the dryer it will fluff it out nicely but that will only last a Day or 2 and it is unrealistic to always be putting it in the dryer. Very disappointed especially at the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Yelnam

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but does not last.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow worked great for a few months, and then it went flat. No amount of tumble drying will keep it from getting flat, it's almost like I have to put it in the dryer every night to keep it from going flat. Update: The company has reached out to me, and they will be sending a replacement pillow to honor the warranty. I will update my review to reflect my experience with the replacement pillow once I receive it.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pillow for proper neck support!
customer_reviews.text: My physical therapist suggested a proper pillow for neck support. This is perfect, but offers additional features as well. When I ordered the pillow a suggestion came up to purchase a pillow cover to protect the pillow from dust mites etc. I purchased the pillow and the case only to be contacted my the company saying that they would like to send me an all cotton breathable pillow case. Nice! The one I purchased would not allow the pillow to breathe and the pillow is in no need for protection from mites. So, very happy with my pillow, with the company and I am sure I will love my all cotton breathable pillow case.
customer_reviews.author: lsk33410

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best pillow I have ever had in my entire life. I was nervous because of the price tag. But, after using it I immediately knew it was worth every penny. It is soft and not too stiff. I love that is has a zipper so you can remove or add foam. I did neither, it was perfect as it was for me. I get really back neck aches sometimes and I started suspecting it was from my pillow. I have slept so peacefully since buying this pillow. It's really a great investment for your sleep and well being.
customer_reviews.author: Misslovely

customer_reviews.title: No more neck and shoulder pain with the Snuggle-Pedic
customer_reviews.text: After only one night of using the Snuggle-Pedic pillow I have already been relieved of major shoulder/neck stiffness and pain. I had been using another "pedic" pillow which cost over $150. What attracted me to the Snuggle-Pedic was an advertisement that said it was the perfect pillow for side-sleepers, and that's me. I have very high hopes for the Snuggle-Pedic, and if it goes anything like the first night then I'm hooked. I'll check back in later and let you other side-sleepers know how things are going. But I would have paid the price of the Snuggle-Pedic for just one good night of pain free sleep, so I've already gotten my money's worth. Good job Relief-Mart!
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Made from the finer materials in the market. Very breathable, firm, yet gentle...absolutely you want a pillow to be perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, very comfortable, and very adjustable pillow made from the finer materials in the market. I have tried many pillows in my lifetime. Nothing compares to this high quality and budget friendly pillow. Very breathable, firm, yet gentle, to help you have a long lasting and well rested night. Buy it. Buy it now. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: After about a month of using this product I find it is better for a back sleeper than a back and side sleeper. I’ve readjusted the stuffing material 3 times already. It’s good, perhaps better than my existing pillows, but very far from perfect. It’s ok for my problem free right side but quite terrible for my painful left side. No helpful tips from customer service either. Will consider returning if there’s no improvement in the next week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best of the Best
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He's been having a lot of back and neck issues. Over the years we have purchased a lot of memory foam pillows. Some a lot more expensive than this. According to him, this by far is the best. When we first received the pillow it wasn't " fluffy and firm" enough for him. I contacted customer service and they very quickly sent out more foam, which was very simple to add to the pillow. He couldn't be more happy. I will now be buying one for myself one.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Aikin

customer_reviews.title: Been 4 months and the pillow is already flat
customer_reviews.text: Based on the good reviews I read and the price paid I expected more from this pillow. I purchased it 4 months ago and its already flat. I didn't expect it to flatten out so much. When I first took it out of the vacuum seal it fluffed up pretty well and I thought it would stay that way. The pillow itself is very comfortable, but I am disappointed by how squished it became after continued use. I might try to throw it in the dryer to fluff it up again but I'm sure it will flatten out again.
customer_reviews.author: TuCool

customer_reviews.title: I really do love it, but the zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a queen pillow a few months back as I was having constant neck pain, and just lousy sleep. I read some reviews and really looked at certain reviewers to see their previous purchases, and ended up selecting this pillow. The king is massive! I think a queen is more than enough, but what the hell, right? I really do love it, but the zipper broke, so I am no longer able to open the pillow, but I put it in the dryer, and BAM! 100% fluff. Highly recommend, if you can get past a zipper issue...
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas R.

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow ever!! Great price too.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one and I love it! I use one at the fire station and one at home. I wasn't getting great sleep at home, with my sleep number pillow, so I decided to get another one of these and I'm so glad I did. It was hard to throw away the Sleep Number pillow due to the cost of it, but once I slept on this pillow, I was sold. Great customer service as well. I asked for some extra stuffing, just in case it wasn't firm enough, and they sent plenty. I didn't end up even using it though. The pillow was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Z

customer_reviews.title: Started well, but went downhill fast
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product providing better sleep than it's predecessor, and initially this was the case. However, I soon noticed the pillow was wadding up and not returning to it's original shape. The pillow just kept getting more out of shape and less comfortable the longer I used it until I had to stop using it due to waking up with a stiff neck and aching back. These problems went away as soon as I replaced the pillow with a new one.
customer_reviews.author: old school

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews, I was excited to try out this pillow. I wanted a pillow that would better support my neck. I just turned 40 years old and figured a better nights rest is finally in order. After trying this pillow for over a week, the result was disappointing. The pillow is very thick and hard. Not soft, not supportive just Kind of uncomfortable. My opinion is only one of many and there are great reviews for this product. I just don't see it. For $60 there has to be better out there. I gave 2 stars because it is American made and supposedly made from non-toxic materials which is important to me as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: This is the most comfortable pillow I have ever had.  Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: What a way to get a good night's sleep! This pillow is wonderful! I don't remember the last time I have been able to sleep so good. It is just the right firmness to provide comfort. My only regret in purchasing this pillow is that I didn't buy it sooner. Thanks for making a genuine quality product. It is well made and has not lost it's shape. I'm certain it will last me for years to come. Sorry I waited so long to write a review; but I wanted to be certain of it's quality. Now I'm able to say goodbye to aches and pains and hello to a good night's sleep. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Cain

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, but didn't last.
customer_reviews.text: So I really wanted to like this pillow. I was looking to replace my tuff & needle pillow, (which lasted over a year but is expensive). The first week on this pillow was amazing. I slept like a rock, no tossing and turning, and no neck pain. But now in the second week I find myself constantly fluffing the pillow and turning it over all throughout the night. I have to put the pillow in the dryer every day for it to be comfortable. I'm glad I can recreate the softness and support of that first week but only if I remember to put it in the dryer first.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Chinn

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pillow for more then 6 months now and it is honestly the best pillow I have ever had in my life. It's great because you can adjust the foam inside (by taking it out) and making it your own to fit what you need. I sleep on my side mostly and have always had trouble finding a pillow to be tall enough so my neck wouldn't hurt and they always failed me. This pillow is the only one that has relieved me from my neck problems and whenever it gets slightly flat, I just stick it in the dryer (like they say to!) and it fluffs right up! Highly recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable pillow I ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow! I have been using it for a month now, and every night, I have been sleeping extremely heavy. The best part of the pillow is that you can remove or add foam as needed. I took about half of the shredded memory foam out of mine. It’s the perfect blend of flat and supportive for me. It was too thick and firm fully loaded. Eventually, when the foam softens up, I have a fresh bag of shredded foam to replace it with!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy LaBranche

customer_reviews.title: Best Pillow Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: My first night with it was great. This is far above and better the old type of pillow. Never thought much about these before. But I was hearing more about bamboo. After looking at the reviews and how bamboo is very versatile I got these. I also bought bamboo pillow cases to seal the deal. The pillow material is so comfortable. It has some weight to it but that is something I will adjust to quickly. The pillow held its form all night. I may get 2 more so that I always have a pile of them to sleep on. I am allergenic and this is going to really help me breathe better in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Jack W. Ferry

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I let it “reanimate” naturally and wow - it pops up quite a bit after being vacuum sealed! That said... it was too thick for me. 3 nights in and I’ve removed 3 ziplock bags of foam (see picture). I think it should be good now! Yes, there’s a bit of smell from the foam but it’s dissipating. I sprayed some linen spray and it helped. YKK locking zippers on both the cover and interior liner (make sure your zipper is locked down). I’ll be curious to hear what the other half thinks once he’s back - he is taller so the height/thickness may be suitable for his.
customer_reviews.author: CPatterTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow ever!
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn't satisfied with the pillow. It was too high for my neck and because it never loses its shape I was having a hard time sleeping. I reached out to the company and they sent me a specially mixed blend so that I could adjust the level to meet my needs and WOW! I really can't say enough positive things about this pillow after I made the adjustment with the fill they sent me! It keeps its shape all night so you don't have to worry about it going flat ever! And it's suuuuuper soft! Thank you Snuggle-Pedic for the greatest pillow ever!
customer_reviews.author: Crys Sal

customer_reviews.title: Comparative to Tempurpedic!
customer_reviews.text: The pillow came rolled up like a yoga mat and when I unrolled it the pillow was flat as a board and I was pretty disappointed. I left it laying flat on my couch and walked away while thinking about returning it. Once I walked back to my couch the pillow had fluffed up on its own & was very comfortable to lay on. My fiancé slept on it last night and was very pleased with the supportive yet soft filling. I’m very happy with this purchase. The seller reached out to me this morning via email with a coupon for a complimentary pillow case which was an unexpected surprise (& in no way swayed my opinion of the pillow).
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: They are very supportive and snuggle but the biggest surprise I had with this company is their want of making sure you are happy with your purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two queen pillows . I was surprise with the quality and the size of these pillows. They are very supportive and snuggle but the biggest surprise I had with this company is their want of making sure you are happy with your purchase. I am a side sleeper with deep shoulders and felt I needed a little me lift and contacted the company ( actually they sent me an E-mail to see if I was happy) and they took care of my problem. Also ordered the complementary pillow case, very roomy and sized to shrink and soft. I ordered a second one the next day. Very nice experience!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Roger B

customer_reviews.title: SECOND SNUGGIE
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS MY SECOND SNUGGIE. IT IS AN EXCHANGE FOR A SNUGGLE-PEDIC BODY PILLOW THAT I ORDERED. THE PILLOW WAS PURCHASED FOR SITTING UP AND WATCHING TV IN BED. THIS PILLOW IS MONSTROUS IN SIZE AFTER FULLY DECOMPRESSING AND SUPER COMFORTABLE. I AM ONLY 5ft-5in, AND THIS PILLOW IS AS TALL AND BIG AS I AM. I CALLED RELIEF MART CUSTOMER SERVICE AND ASKED THEM IF THE ULTRA LUXURY KING SIZE PILLOW AND THE ULTRA LUXURY BODY PILLOW USED THE SAME MEMORY FOAM, I WAS TOLD YES, HENCE THE EXCHANGE. THE KING SIZE SERVES THE SAME PURPOSE AND WORKS BETTER FOR ME. THANK YOU RELIEF MART/SNUGGLE-PEDIC.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES W.

customer_reviews.title: Top customer service for an awesome pillow!
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is exactly as described. Very soft bamboo cover on the outside. Interior is made of the various types of foam. I personally found the king size to be thicker then I needed. After removing some of the foam, I noticed it was the perfect thickness but still a little to firm. A quick email was met with an almost instantaneous response that they will be sending out a softer foam fill. Being that the pillow is almost perfect with the foam fill now, I am confident it will be the perfect pillow for me once I receive the new softer foam.
customer_reviews.author: scott Boykin

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for hot heads. Awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow mostly because my memory foam pillow is too hot for the summer and I was not disapointed. I have tried many pillows and this one is the only one that doesn't make me sweat. The pillow was great out of the box, but I preferred to have something a bit softer. I noticed the company had sent me an email explaining that they offer free fill replacement of different firmness levels so I replied and stated I would like the softest they had. They responded very promptly in a had new fill in a couple of days with instructions on how to replace. The company service is top notch. I recommend this pillow to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: the perfect pillow. I have been searching for years to ...
customer_reviews.text: Alas, the perfect pillow. I have been searching for years to find the one. I’ve gone through four or five pillows alone last year. Each one initially fine but over time hurt my neck and produced other problems. This one however, is a miracle. At first, it was too thick for my liking. I knew though that you can take material out to flatten it. Regardless I left it all in and tried it out anyway. I haven’t needed to remove any material. It has nicely confirmed to my head. I adore this pillow and am extremely pleased it actually works for me!
customer_reviews.author: AstroMelissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this pillow for a few months now and it has been great. It did have a slight odor when it first arrived, but it dissipated within a day or two. I fluffed it up in the dryer, per instructions, and its like sleeping on a cloud, super soft yet supportive. I have slept on it a few times, but it was ultimately a gift for my bf. Best thing, he use to snore like a chainsaw at night whenever he slept on his back, it has STOPPED since he has slept on this pillow. I can get a sound nights sleep and I couldn't be happier! Would definitely recommend for back or side sleepers, its a great pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne brandt

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it...you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!!!! This is the most comfortable pillow I have ever owned. I have back & neck problems and this has made sleeping actually comfortable and enjoyable. I have never slept so soundly. Would give 20 stars if I could. Also, this is my 3rd one purchased bc I loved it so much. My original one is well over a year old and still feels brand new.
customer_reviews.author: NIKKI

customer_reviews.title: Best pillow EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to find a thinner or softer pillow. Being able to customize the pillow was perfect for me. The pillow, as it comes, is a little thick and hard for me, however, after removing some of the foam it was much thinner and softer. Since I prefer a really soft pillow, Relief-Mart was contacted and they will be sending a package of soft foam. No charge! It was less than 24 hours between my emailing and their placing an order for the foam. Their customer service or the Snuggle-Pedic pillow couldn't get any better!
customer_reviews.author: Chary

customer_reviews.title: Really tried to like it but overall made things worse
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for three months now and it simply doesn’t help my neck. I waited longer than I should have to write this because I thought it needed longer to evaluate. I’m 6’4” with broad shoulders and I can only arrive at the conclusion that this is designed for a smaller frame. I get very little support for my neck and I wake up with constant pain each morning. I have to wedge the pillow at an angle to get any support for my neck. Wish this would have done it but will continue looking for a better alternative.
customer_reviews.author: John Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Genius Design!! Totally customizable.
customer_reviews.text: I was complaining to a friend about pillows and how the “temperpedic” style pillows are ergonomic for your neck but they are just uncomfortable and stiff for a side sleeper like myself, and he sent me a link to this Snuggle pedic pillow. When I got it I tried sleeping with it the first night and I found it a little too full so I unzipped it and removed about 5-10% of the material inside and now it is PERFECT. I’m a 6’3 man and my wife is much smaller, why would our pillows be the same?! This design is genius. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jacques s.

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the best pillow
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is amazing. After spending hundreds of dollars seeking the perfect pillow, I finally found it. This is easily adjustable to sleeping preferences & if your sleeping preferences change, you can adjust again. (I removed some of filling & saved for future use if needed. ) I experienced very little odor with this pillow. I let it air out for one day before using. I only ordered one king size just to try. I will now be ordering more, in different sizes for all the beds in my home. With a 90 day money back guarantee you can’t go wrong purchasing this pillow. As an added bonus, these pillows are made in the USA. I highly recommend this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: XR250mom

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Tried to like this pillow. Customer service is good no doubt. But even after the free adjustments this pillow requires to be put in dryer like once per week or wise gets all flat. Bought one for GF at time I bought this one, now after about 1 year in. We both aren't very happy with our pillows from here. Still better quality than most junk in stores. But didnt work out for us. Update: After two years, determined this thing is junk, uncomfortable and gets hot and needs to be re-puff all the time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for scoliosis sufferers, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered the king size and loved it but realized it's just too big for me. I contacted the seller and they have fabulous customer service. They emailed me a return label and instructed me to put a note in the box that I wanted a queen size plus extra fill. I received a refund for the difference and my queen size pillow was delivered today. I'm very pleased! The pillow is great.
